Page Layout Summative

Apps Used:

Topics

  • Die Lines
  • Duotones
  • Spot Colour Channels
  • Beautiful Line Art
  • Prepress Skillz
  • Brushes
  • Pastel Drawing
  • Page Layout Formative
  • Page Layout Output
  • Page Layout Summative
  • Dimension
  • Dimension Summative

Students will create a layout, then save it in ePUB format.

Your Assignment

This is a summative assignment. It evaluates your mastery of the skills in this instructional unit. This assignment contributes to your final grade in the course. You will earn a letter grade.

Your Grading System

Supplemental Links

Submission Instructions

Once you've completed your work, save and close your documents. Name the exercise folder Last name, First name, Group NÂº, Page Layout Summative so,

Appleseed-Johnny-#-Page Layout Summative

Right-click the exercise folder only, then choose Compress... to create a zip file for submission.

Failure to submit your files as directed will incur a proportional loss of points. If your file/folder is not named with your name, you will earn a zero. Why?
